TopicTitle: Star Wars pod racer tutorial and showcase video + craft file!

Articles.Content:
Hi!, it's been about 2 months away from KSP, 2 months of vacations and playing other games..., but man, you can never be away for too long, this game has some chemistry that makes you come back really quick!

I left my youtube subscribers alone, but now I bring you all a new video tutorial, showing the new pod racer I made. It's in """"""""english""""""". spoken. It's probably horrible but if you can understand it, it's good enough for me!. I hope you can make your own awesome pod racers with these little and easy tips (really, it's not that hard once you know a way to build and configure the pod racer).

The craft file is here, check the action groups in the description.

Mod list:

--what you need to open craft file--

(all updated to the date of this video)

B9 aerospace

Procedural wings (Procedural dynamics)

Tweak Scale

Kerbal Attachment System

Kerbal Foundries

--what I also use in the video--

EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements

Astronomers visual pack

hot rockets

Ferram Aerospace Research

improved chase camera

Anyway, here's the video tutorial and showcase. no debug menu or cheats used

And the videos of my previous pod racers, without repulsors

enjoy!

Wh-Wh-why would you make a pod racer so big? (Especially with Tweakscale and Procedural Wings!)

When I was a young lad, I had to walk to school, uphill both ways! I had a cell phone that didn't even text! ...and when I built Pod Racers, I had to build them very small, only using stock parts!

...you have it easy, sonny.

...

You know I'm just busting your chops, m1sz. Very nice design, once again. Thanks for sharing.

Yeah, now that you say it, I could make it smaller with tweak scale.. xD Anyway, it's about the proportions!, and that is ok :-P

thanks for your kind words! :-)
